frameset.edef: to long or yearn for, to hunger for

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN صَوت) (NP (POSS_PRON_2MS َك))) (VP (ADJ.VN واحِش) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (PRON_1S نِي)))) (CONJ وِ) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1S انا)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG عارْفَة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (S (VP (IV1S+IV اَصاحِب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN حَدّ) (ADJ تانِي))))))))
